item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (526 points | 259 comments)
2. Bill Gates's Personal Easter Eggs in 8 Bit BASIC (2008) (32 points | 2 comments)
3. Dad and the Egg Controller (2018) (9 points | 1 comment)
4. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (257 points | 57 comments)
5. The Seven-Year Rule (44 points | 30 comments)
6. Slinky-Coil Dipole (2021) (7 points | discuss)
7. The Passing of Ucbvax (1994) (10 points | discuss)
8. CosAE: Learnable Fourier Series for Image Restoration (6 points | discuss)
9. An end to all this prostate trouble? (434 points | 186 comments)
10. Stuffed-Na(a)N: stuff your NaNs (83 points | 40 comments)
11. Barlow's Principles of Adult Behaviour (65 points | 34 comments)
12. Hundreds more NSF grants terminated after agency director resigns (20 points | discuss)
13. The Friendship Recession: The lost art of connecting (302 points | 230 comments)
14. Cloth (386 points | 45 comments)
15. LLMs can see and hear without any training (140 points | 49 comments)
16. I wrote a book called "Crap Towns". It seemed funny at the time (356 points | 262 comments)
17. Thank you for holding my duck (2021) (53 points | 17 comments)
18. Ask HN: Why do we celebrate AI-Copilots but reject AI–Generated art? (16 points | 30 comments)
19. Tilt: dev environment as code (11 points | 6 comments)
20. Berkeley Humanoid Lite – Open-source robot (252 points | 32 comments)
21. Australian who ordered radioactive materials walks away from court (203 points | 228 comments)
22. Show HN: Rocal UI – A simple template engine with Rust (6 points | discuss)
23. Robot Dexterity Still Seems Hard (21 points | 15 comments)
24. Freshpaint (YC S19) is hiring back end and front end engineers (Remote, US only) ( | hide)
25. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (141 points | 28 comments)
26. CONL: "Markdown" for your config files (11 points | 4 comments)
27. Lossless LLM compression for efficient GPU inference via dynamic-length float (391 points | 109 comments)
28. Fifteen new giant radio galaxies discovered with ASKAP (31 points | 1 comment)
29. University of Waterloo withholds coding contest results over suspected AI use (49 points | 52 comments)
30. Wikipedia’s nonprofit status questioned by D.C. U.S. attorney (820 points | 736 comments)
